snippet: An eclectic assortment of guests appeared at a tongue-in-cheek tribute to the collected writings of the legendary conceptual artist, including Alex Israel, Hans Ulrich Obrist and Fred Savage — yes, that Fred Savage.
abstract: An eclectic assortment of guests appeared at a tongue-in-cheek tribute to the collected writings of the legendary conceptual artist, including Alex Israel, Hans Ulrich Obrist and Fred Savage — yes, that Fred Savage.

headline.main: Artists Gather for a Spoken-Word Tribute to the Diabolical Wit and Wisdom of John Baldessari
